name: test_e2e_with_logs[309_CMD_BASIC_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASIC_005` |
| **Name** | Password file access attempt |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | basic_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; cat /etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~71000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:30:59.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_005-1770841859800-47is0f pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_005 uri=/?q=%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_005-1770841859800-47is0f pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_005 uri=/?q=%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
20:30:59.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASIC_005-1770841859800-47is0f pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_005 uri=/?q=%3B%20cat%20/etc/passwd client=127.0.0.1
```
